column4: is there some easy way to play a dvd image (.iso) just by somehow selecting the file? it's a mess having to symlink /dev/dvd to /dev/loop/0 and mount the disc everytime I want to watch a dvd
and what media players are out there? I'd like something with real playlist management, xine's just weird.
my xine plays the Dvd when you insert it in the machine
Yeah, but backed up dvd copies.
